• 50% OFF our men's bracelets.

settings.title: The Peoples Choice
settings.content:
Here at Awareness Avenue we've sold over 100,000 of our men's bracelets. They are a beloved customer favorite with 1000s of raving reviews and were qualified for best men's gifts in 2022 and 2023.

You simply cannot go wrong with this bracelet as a special lifelong keepsake for a special man in your life.

settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
Our men's bracelets are handcrafted and braided to perfection. They are a fantastic choice as a fashionable gift for a special person in your life and also super affordable.

Our braided bracelets are made from a high quality synthetic leather alternative. This keeps the bracelets equal in quality to leather without the ethical hassle and high price point.

Our men's bracelets go through extensive quality assurance to ensure no risk to your skin and no uncomfortable smells. They are of clean and pristine quality.

  • Braid Material: Synthetic leather imitation. Completely safe for all skin types.
  • Beads material: High quality hypo-allergenic stainless steel. Safe for all skin types.
  • Braid Quality: For all intents and purposes our synthetic leather alternative matches real leather in quality and durability.
  • Bracelet Sizes: We offer 3 sizes for our bracelets. Children, Teen and Adult. The clasp can open securely and the bracelet does give a little, so don't worry about getting the size perfect. If it doen't fit we will exchange it for free.

settings.title: Size & Fit
settings.content:
We want you to feel completely confident in your purchase. If the size is not right, we will replace it for free with the correct size. You can rest completely easily your gift will be perfect.

You can see our size options above under the main product page. We offer children, teen and adult sizes. Since the bracelets can give a little and the clasps can be opened they generally fit their age groups perfectly.

settings.title: Our Gifts For You
settings.content:
A Luxury Experience When You Order Today.

With your order today you get all these additional gifts:

  • A completely free giftcard as shown above in the main product images.
  • A velvet pouch for your bracelet for added protection and safekeeping.
  • An authenticity letter for the metal of your jewelry to certify its quality.
  • Lifetime Warranty for free. We we stand behind our products.
  • Resizing guarantee included for free: Doesn't fit right? We will replace the bracelet 1 time free of charge for you to get the perfect size.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.content:
We stand behind the quality and craftsmanship of our jewelry with our lifetime warranty.

Our promise of "Ethical Jewelry, Guaranteed for Life" means every piece is crafted to be a lasting symbol of beauty and integrity.

We want you to feel confident that your jewelry will remain as stunning as the day you first wore it, now and for years to come.
We're proud to say we've served over 250,000 customers since 2016 and sold over 100,000 Love You Forever bracelets.

What an AMAZING COMPANY!!!

"It is such a pleasure to shop with someone that actually cares, respects and values their customer. I brought a gift, it was the wrong size. They acted so quickly to make my gift perfect even with me making tge mistake of ordering the wrong size. That is a company that cares about their customers!! The Best thing is their product is as beautiful as the picture and Very high quality. I am a customer for life❤️"
Susan.
